text: Ñɨ yad Timoti, nep takaw ogɨnap agɨnɨgebin. Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok, kɨli nep ned agɨlak tek gɨnɨmɨn. Takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd agen, nad takaw yɨp ak dɨl, nɨgtep gɨl gos pal ak teplep won ak nɨg mɨdɨlɨg, Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨmɨn. Gos lɨnɨgɨlɨg, takaw kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl ag dad ame, tap tɨmel gebal anɨb okok kelɨgɨnɨgel. Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli nepal, tap tɨtɨmel ogɨnap gɨpal. Kɨli pen God ne ke chɨnop gɨtep gaŋ agɨl gos ma nepal. Anɨb ak, Klays nop gos nepal ak kɨdek pen, gos kɨli tɨmel gak, sip kab kalanas ayaŋ am chɨk ñub pɨsnep tɨmel gak ak tek gak.
